Html:
Hi!

I'm trying to duplicate an excel sheet with multiple printing areas.

When I do it (with excel5 on phpexcel 1.7.1), the printing areas definition seems to be lost. also I didn't find a way to set it manually from the library.

Is there any solution for it?

 

Thank you for this great excel library!

-Itamar

Work item created:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10919

Will try to put it on the todo list for next week.

Try with latest source code in a couple of hours:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

Works like a charm!

I really appreciate your fast response.

Itamar
